name: Google
description: Google is one of the pioneering search engines. It is also the most widely used search engine to this day. Google has established an ecosystem of products like email, online video, GPS systems and more.

name: flickr
description: Flickr is a social media platform for photographers to share their images. It has established itself as leading platform as it appealz to both profesionals and ametures alike. Additionally, those whoe are in need ofquality images are sure to find something useful here.

name: W3schools
description: W3Schools is a collection of tutorials, documentation and exercises to help you learn the many languages of web development.

name: MDN JavaScript Doc
description: The Mozilla JavaScript Docmentation is very very thorough. At the same time, it is friendly to newcomers and provides tutorials of many different skill levesl.

name: Bootstrap Doc
description: Bootstrap is a CSS framework that gaurantees responsiveness across all devices, in addition to providing many useful components for your website. The documentation found here will take you step by step towards implementation.
